name: Holoscape
description:
This is a game made for the Ludum Dare 47, and the theme was : Stuck in a Loop. Escape in your own way : leave a hologram !

Here you are, trapped in this labyrinth of test rooms and labs. You are being watched very closely, and escaping won't be easy. 

You'll need to be smart, and use your ability of leaving your own hologram behind in order to cross and overcome the many challenges you're facing.

Features

- Move and Jump
- Leave an immaterial hologram
- Teleport back to your hologram

PC Controls : Let's meet the team !

Antoine Esbelin - Programer
Karim Al-Homsi - Programer
Manon Ly - Game Artist
Gary Corad - Game Artist
Anthony Wilkinson - Game Artist
Robin Le Guyader - Game Designer / Sound Designer
Yoan Saboureau - Game Designer
Marie Wajsblat - Producer

Credits for the music :

License : http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Kevin MacLeod - Chill Wave
Link : https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3498-chill-wave

Kevin MacLeod - Son of A Rocket
Link : https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4391-son-of-a-rocket

The music was not modified.

Thanks for playing our game !
